hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Zelda's Lullaby#.
